metadata.title: CVE-2018-5295 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In PoDoFo 0.9.5, there is an integer overflow in thePdfXRefStreamParserObject::ParseStream function(base/PdfXRefStreamParserObject.cpp). Remote attackers could leverage thisvulnerability to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted pdf file.

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
